experiences.title: Intern
experiences.subtitle: Brakes India  Ltd
workDescription: Expanded expertise in real-time machinery by studying the principles, operations, and design processes of systems utilized at Brakes India, enhancing understanding of complex infrastructure.
Gained hands-on experience with CNC machines, testing equipment, and process automation used in brake manufacturing.
Acquired in-depth knowledge of braking system manufacturing and software integration, focusing on machine-specific programs to enhance operational efficiency.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.subtitle: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Design & Manufacturing
workDescription: Developed an AI-driven system for real-time network threat detection by analyzing traffic logs from multiple end nodes. Implemented log parsing, classification, and an intelligent container-triggering mechanism to handle specific attacks like DDoS and port scanning. Designed a GUI dashboard to monitor threats and reduced false positives through model fine-tuning.
